title: Is the MMR vaccine unsafe or ineffective?
description: Answer (1 of 10): It is neither unsafe nor ineffective. It is both safe and effective. There's a very scaremongering answer below, but most of the links provided are to anti-vaccination websites which have never hesitated to distort and misrepresent evidence.
